title: Sri Lanka
heading: Data Collection & Field Services in Sri Lanka (Nationwide):
list: Coverage: Colombo + regional teams across Kandy, Galle, Jaffna, Negombo, Anuradhapura, Trincomalee, Batticaloa.

QC & Compliance: 100% back-checks on critical items, random checks elsewhere, GPS/time-stamps, consented recordings, GDPR-aware processes; additional safeguards for child/youth research.
